sen.j: 岩倉 具満（いわくら ともみつ、文化 (元号)7年（1810年） - 文化10年（1813年））は、江戸時代後期の廷臣。
sen.e: Tomomitsu IWAKURA (1810 - 1813) was a retainer of Imperial Court in the latter period of the Edo period.
Tomomitsu IWAKURA (1810 - 1813) was a retainer of Imperial Court during the latter Edo period.
Tomomitsu IWAKURA (1810 - 1813) was a retainer of Imperial Court during the latter Edo period.
His court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His father was a Kugyo (the top court officials) Tomoai IWAKURA.
His father was a Kugyo (top court official) Tomoai IWAKURA.
His father was a Kugyo (top court official) Tomoai IWAKURA.

sen.j: 母は公卿綾小路俊資の娘。
sen.e: His mother was a daughter of a Kugyo (the top court officials) Toshisuke AYANOKOJI.
His mother was the daughter of a Kugyo (top court official) Toshisuke AYANOKOJI.
His mother was the daughter of a Kugyo, Toshisuke AYANOKOJI.
sen.cmt: 公卿 既出のため、補足を削除しました。

sen.j: 義理の弟（いずれも年長者だが）に岩倉具賢・岩倉具慶らがいる。
sen.e: He had Tomokata IWAKURA and Tomoyoshi IWAKURA as his younger brother-in-law (even though both of them were older than Tomomitsu).
He had Tomokata IWAKURA and Tomoyoshi IWAKURA as his younger brother-in-law (even though both of them were older than Tomomitsu).
He had Tomokata IWAKURA and Tomoyoshi IWAKURA as his younger brother-in-law (even though both of them were older than Tomomitsu).

sen.j: 岩倉家の嫡男であったが、幼くして夭折。
sen.e: He was the legitimate son of the Iwakura family, but diet at an early age.
He was the legitimate son of the Iwakura family, but died at an early age.
He was the legitimate son of the Iwakura family, but died at an early age.

sen.j: そのため今城家から具賢が具満の養子として岩倉家に迎えられたが、具賢もまもなく夭折。
sen.e: Because of that, Tomokata was adopted from the Imaki family as a child of Tomomitsu, but Tomokata also died at an early age.
Because of that, Tomokata was adopted from the Imaki family as a child of Tomomitsu, but Tomokata also died at an early age.
Because of that, Tomokata was adopted from the Imaki family as a child of Tomomitsu, but Tomokata also died at an early age.

sen.j: 最終的には大原家から具慶が具賢の養子として岩倉家を継いだ。
sen.e: Finally, Tomoyoshi was adopted from the Ohara family as a child of Tomokata, and inherited the Iwakura family.
Finally, Tomoyoshi was adopted from the Ohara family as a child of Tomokata, and he inherited the Iwakura family.
Finally, Tomoyoshi was adopted from the Ohara family as a child of Tomokata, and he inherited the Iwakura family.

sen.j: その具慶の養子が明治維新の功臣岩倉具視である。
sen.e: An adopted child of Tomoyoshi is a meritorious vassal of the Meiji Restoration, Tomomi IWAKURA.
The adopted child of Tomoyoshi was the meritorious vassal of the Meiji Restoration, Tomomi IWAKURA.
The adopted child of Tomoyoshi was the meritorious vassal of the Meiji Restoration, Tomomi IWAKURA.
